d %>%

          glue::glue("<a href = {x}>{fontawesome::fa('clipboard-list')}</a>")
        )
      )
    }
  ) %>%
  text_transform(cells_body(columns = c(Slides)),
    fn = function(x) {

        glue::glue("<a href = {x}>{fontawesome::fa('person-chalkboard')}</a>")
        )
      )
    }
  ) %>%
  text_transform(cells_body(columns = c(Lab)),
    fn = function(x) {
      ifelse(is.na(x), fontawesome::fa("book", fill_opacity = 0),

  ) %>%

      ifelse(is.na(x), fontawesome::fa("wand-magic-sparkles", fill_opacity = 0),

  cols_align(
